channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed dual mandate: Why inflation has priority over labor market

Donald Trump Flips Out At Wall Street Journal Reporter: ‘You Hear Me? What I Said?’

Divorce lawyer arrested 12 years after Ohio nurse stabbed to death
item.description: The arrest of 51-year-old Gregory J. Moore marks the latest twist in a cold case that has eluded Ohio authorities since 2013.

item.title: GOP congressman is shelled with questions about Trump during raucous town hall
item.description: Voters in U.S. Rep. Mike Lawler’s suburban New York swing district unloaded a barrage of criticism on the Republican during a raucous town hall, peppe...

item.title: Indigenous people raise awareness about their missing and murdered
Former VP Pence defends Constitution after getting Profile in Courage Award
item.description: He described the Constitution as what "binds us all together."

item.title: Israeli security cabinet approves plan to occupy parts of Gaza, source says
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's security cabinet approved an operational plan for the expansion of the war in Gaza in a meeting late Sunda...

item.title: From debate to dialogue: In a contentious era, ‘Ethics Bowl’ offers students a gentler alternative
item.description: The National High School Ethics Bowl has just concluded its competition at the University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump threatens tariff on all movies produced abroad
item.description: President Donald Trump said efforts by foreign nations to attract American filmmakers and studios constitutes "a National Security threat."

item.title: In battle against transgender rights, Trump targets HUD’s housing policies
Indigenous people raise awareness about their missing and murdered
item.description: Indigenous people across North America are rallying to plead for sustained responses to violence in their communities

item.title: 3 dead, 5 hurt in shooting at Glendale, Arizona steakhouse, police say
item.description: Glendale, Arizona police say three people are dead and five injured after a shooting at a business Sunday night. No one was under arrest.

item.title: Met Gala theme "Superfine: Tailoring Black Style" explained
item.description: The Met Gala is back for 2025 in NYC, shining a spotlight on Black dandyism. Here's what to know about this year's theme explained.

item.title: The Real ID deadline is approaching. Here's what to know.
item.description: Americans will be required to switch to the new form of identification by Wednesday, May 7, if they want to fly domestically.
